I have been doing freelance writing/ghostwriting since 2008. I recently graduated from Liberty University with a BS in English and Writing. I am currently pursuing my Master's in Creative Writing at Liberty University.
I do excellent research, I have good grammar skills, I write to your expectations, I write quickly, and I am easy to communicate with.

Monday through Saturday. I do not work on Sunday.
I will NOT give out my home phone number or personal email. I like working through the Guru messages to protect myself and my employers.
I will work on a per job basis or on an hourly basis. I do expect a "safe-pay" deposit because I have been burned before and now I only write when I am sure of payment. After I have worked for an employer several times we can disregard the safe-pay because we will have established a relationship of trust.

* Advance payment negotiable. At least 60% payment needed after sending the sample designs, remaining balance can be paid after receiving final files.

* You can discuss anything with me to ensure better output which best fits for you. I’m always at your service.
